select F_DATE, max(case F_DIRECTION_TYPE when '0' then F_MONEY else 0 end ) f_Income, max(case F_DIRECTION_TYPE when '1' then F_MONEY else 0 end ) f_Expense, (max(case F_DIRECTION_TYPE when '0' then F_MONEY else 0 end ) - max(case F_DIRECTION_TYPE when '1' then F_MONEY else 0 end )) f_Balance from( SELECT LEFT (F_DATE, 7) F_DATE, IF (F_DIRECTION_TYPE = '0','0','1') F_DIRECTION_TYPE,round(sum(F_MONEY), 2) F_MONEY FROM bs_bookflow
AND F_DATE like CONCAT('%','${f_Date}','%' )
AND F_USERID = #{f_UserId}
GROUP BY LEFT (F_DATE, 7),F_DIRECTION_TYPE ORDER BY F_DATE,F_DIRECTION_TYPE ) TAB group by F_DATE
